title: Aggie Fest 2025
description: Celebrate NC A&T with food trucks, live music, and games on the main quad.

title: Career Fair
description: Meet top employers and find internship opportunities.

title: STEM Innovation Expo

title: Homecoming Parade

description: Enjoy free health checks, fitness shows, and workshops at Corbett Sports Center.
